references: Boris Adamczewski, "The Many Faces of the Kempner Number", Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 16 (2013), #13.2.15.
Jeffrey Shallit, Simple continued fractions for some irrational numbers. J. Number Theory 11 (1979), no. 2, 209-217.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Simon Plouffe, Plouffe's Inverter, sum(1/2^(2^n), n=0..infinity); to 20000 digits
Jeffrey Shallit, Simple continued fractions for some irrational numbers. J. Number Theory 11 (1979), no. 2, 209-217.
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=suminf(n=0, 1/2^(2^n)); x*=10; for (n=0, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b007404.txt", n, " ", d)); } [From _Harry J. Smith_, May 07 2009]
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Edited by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 11 2002
Deleted old PARI program _Harry J. Smith_, May 20 2009
